## Air Passengers

&nbsp;
&nbsp;

```{r showairplot, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#plotting a Boxplot with Sepal.Length variable and storing it in box_plot 
data(AirPassengers)
time_series<-plot_ly(x=time(AirPassengers),y=AirPassengers,type="scatter",mode="lines") #defining labels and titile using layout() 
layout(time_series,title = "AirPassengers Dataset - Time Series Plot", xaxis = list(title = "Time"), yaxis = list(title = "Passengers"))
```
